en.title: Creation and Humanity's Calling
en.headline: God speaks the cosmos into being and entrusts His image-bearers to cultivate it.
en.summary: The opening chapters of Genesis introduce God as the sovereign Creator who forms a good and ordered world. Humanity is fashioned in His image to steward creation and dwell in fellowship with Him.
takeaways: Creation is purposeful, reflecting God's wisdom and goodness.
Human dignity flows from bearing God's image and sharing His mission.
Sabbath rest anchors rhythm and worship in the created order.

zh.title: 创造与人的使命
zh.headline: 上帝以话语创造万物，并托付祂的形象承担者治理世界。
zh.summary: 创世记开篇显明上帝是至高的创造主，祂以次序和美善造了世界。人按着上帝的形象被造，要管理受造界，并与上帝亲密同行。
takeaways: 创造充满目的，彰显上帝的智慧与良善。
人的尊严源于承载上帝的形象，并参与祂的使命。
安息日成为创造秩序中敬拜与休息的节奏。

en.title: Call of Abram and the Covenant Promise
en.headline: God elects Abram and promises blessing for all nations through his family.
en.summary: Abram is invited to leave his homeland and trust God's promise of land, offspring, and blessing. The covenant with Abram marks the beginning of God's redemptive people.
takeaways: Faith responds to God's voice even when the destination is unknown.
God's mission has always envisioned the blessing of every nation.
Covenant relationship binds God and His people in steadfast love.

zh.title: 亚伯兰的呼召与盟约应许
zh.headline: 上帝拣选亚伯兰，透过他的家族赐福万国。
zh.summary: 亚伯兰被呼召离开本地本族，相信上帝关于土地、后裔与祝福的应许。与亚伯兰所立的约，标志着上帝救赎群体的起头。
takeaways: 信心是回应上帝的呼召，即便前路未明也愿意踏上旅程。
上帝的使命从起初就指向万国得福。
盟约关系使上帝与祂的子民连结于永不止息的慈爱。

en.title: Exodus and the Sinai Covenant
en.headline: The Lord redeems Israel from slavery and forms them into a covenant nation at Sinai.
en.summary: Through mighty signs, God delivers Israel from Pharaoh, leading them through the sea and into freedom. At Sinai, He reveals His law and establishes a covenant identity centred on worship and justice.
takeaways: Salvation is liberation into a new way of life with God.
The law reveals God's character and guides redeemed community.
God's presence among His people is the heart of the covenant.

zh.title: 出埃及与西奈之约
zh.headline: 耶和华拯救以色列脱离奴役，并在西奈山建立盟约之民。
zh.summary: 上帝借着大能神迹使以色列人脱离法老，领他们经过红海进入自由。在西奈山，神赐下律法，建立以敬拜与公义为核心的盟约身份。
takeaways: 拯救意味着进入与神同行的新生活方式。
律法显明上帝的品格，引导蒙救赎的群体生活。
神与百姓同住是盟约的核心。

en.title: Davidic Kingdom and Worship
en.headline: God establishes David's throne and centres Israel's worship in Jerusalem.
en.summary: Israel unites under David, who captures Jerusalem and brings the ark into the city. God promises an enduring dynasty, while David prepares for Solomon to build the temple.
takeaways: Leadership after God's heart shepherds people toward worship.
The Davidic covenant fuels hope for a righteous eternal King.
True security flows from God's presence, not military strength.

zh.title: 大卫王国与敬拜中心
zh.headline: 上帝坚定大卫的王位，使以色列的敬拜以耶路撒冷为中心。
zh.summary: 以色列在大卫手下统一，他攻取耶路撒冷并迎接约柜进入圣城。神应许赐下永远的王朝，大卫也预备所罗门建造圣殿。
takeaways: 合乎神心意的领导带领百姓归向敬拜。
大卫之约成为盼望公义永恒君王的根基。
真正的安全来自神的同在，而不是军事力量。

en.title: Fall of Jerusalem and Babylonian Exile
en.headline: Judah's rebellion leads to Jerusalem's destruction, yet prophetic hope endures.
en.summary: After centuries of idolatry and injustice, Babylon conquers Jerusalem. The temple is destroyed and leaders are exiled. Prophets like Jeremiah and Ezekiel announce both judgment and future restoration.
takeaways: Ignoring God's covenant warnings leads to devastating consequences.
Even in exile, God remains present and speaks through His prophets.
Hope of a new covenant arises amid discipline and loss.

zh.title: 耶路撒冷陷落与被掳
zh.headline: 犹大背叛盟约导致圣城被毁，但先知仍宣告盼望。
zh.summary: 在长期的偶像崇拜与不义之后，巴比伦攻陷耶路撒冷。圣殿被毁，领袖被掳。耶利米、以西结等先知在审判中同时宣告复兴的应许。
takeaways: 无视神的警戒将招致严重后果。
即使身处被掳之地，神仍与子民同在并发声。
在管教与失落中，新约的盼望逐渐显明。

en.title: Return from Exile and Temple Rebuilding
en.headline: God stirs hearts to rebuild the temple, renew the covenant, and await Messiah.
en.summary: Persia allows Jewish exiles to return. Under leaders like Zerubbabel, Ezra, and Nehemiah, the temple and Jerusalem's walls are restored, and the people recommit to God’s law.
takeaways: God can move empires to fulfil His restorative purposes.
Community renewal requires both worship and justice.
Anticipation grows for the promised anointed ruler.

zh.title: 归回与圣殿重建
zh.headline: 上帝感动人心重建圣殿，更新盟约，等待弥赛亚。
zh.summary: 波斯允许犹太人归回。所罗巴伯、以斯拉、尼希米等带领民众重建圣殿和城墙，并重新立约遵行神的律法。
takeaways: 神能动摇帝国以成就祂复兴的旨意。
群体的更新需要敬拜与公义并重。
人们对所应许的受膏者怀抱更深的期待。

en.title: Birth of Jesus the Messiah
en.headline: The eternal Word becomes flesh, fulfilling centuries of prophetic hope.
en.summary: Jesus is born to Mary in Bethlehem by the Holy Spirit. Angels announce peace, shepherds worship, and Simeon blesses the child as the light for all nations.
takeaways: God enters human history with humility and glory intertwined.
Jesus fulfills promises to David and Abraham.
The incarnation reveals God's nearness to the marginalized.

zh.title: 弥赛亚耶稣的降生
zh.headline: 永恒的道成了肉身，成就历代先知的盼望。
zh.summary: 耶稣因圣灵感孕，由马利亚在伯利恒生下。天使宣告大喜的信息，牧人敬拜，西面称这孩子为万民的光。
takeaways: 上帝进入历史，谦卑与荣耀并行。
耶稣成全对大卫和亚伯拉罕的应许。
道成肉身彰显神亲近卑微之人。

en.title: Jesus Announces the Kingdom of God
en.headline: Through teaching, miracles, and compassion, Jesus reveals the kingdom breaking in.
en.summary: Jesus proclaims the kingdom, heals the sick, forgives sins, and forms disciples. His parables and Sermon on the Mount unveil the ethics of a renewed humanity.
takeaways: The kingdom is present wherever Jesus reigns and restores.
Following Jesus means embodying upside-down kingdom values.
Miracles serve as signs pointing to deeper spiritual renewal.

zh.title: 耶稣宣告神的国
zh.headline: 耶稣借着教导、神迹与怜悯显明临到的国度。
zh.summary: 耶稣宣讲神国福音，医治疾病、赦免罪孽并栽培门徒。祂的比喻与登山宝训揭示更新人性的国度伦理。
takeaways: 神国临到之处，就是耶稣掌权并带来复原之处。
跟随耶稣意味着活出颠覆世俗的国度价值。
神迹是指向深层属灵更新的记号。

en.title: Crucifixion and Resurrection
en.headline: Jesus bears sin on the cross and rises victorious, defeating death.
en.summary: Jesus dies during Passover, the perfect Lamb offering Himself for humanity. On the third day, He rises, appearing to many witnesses and inaugurating new creation.
takeaways: The cross reveals God's justice and love intertwined.
Resurrection is the cornerstone of Christian hope.
Believers are invited into a restored relationship with God.

zh.title: 十字架与复活
zh.headline: 耶稣担当罪孽被钉十字架，并胜过死亡复活。
zh.summary: 逾越节期间，耶稣如同无瑕疵的羔羊为世人献上自己。第三日祂从死里复活，向众多见证人显现，开启新创造。
takeaways: 十字架显明上帝的公义与慈爱彼此交织。
复活是基督信仰盼望的基石。
信徒得以进入与神和好的新关系。

en.title: Pentecost and the Spirit-Empowered Church
en.headline: The Holy Spirit fills believers, launching a global witness to Jesus.
en.summary: On Pentecost, the Spirit descends on the disciples, enabling bold proclamation in many languages. Thousands believe, forming a vibrant community marked by teaching, fellowship, and generosity.
takeaways: The Spirit empowers the church for mission and unity.
Church life flourishes through shared worship, care, and witness.
God's promise extends to every generation and nation.

zh.title: 五旬节与圣灵充满的教会
zh.headline: 圣灵降临门徒，开启向万国作见证的使命。
zh.summary: 五旬节那天，圣灵降临在门徒身上，使他们用多种语言勇敢传讲。三千人信主，建立以教导、团契与慷慨为标志的活泼群体。
takeaways: 圣灵赋予教会完成使命并活出合一。
教会生活在敬拜、关怀与见证中蓬勃发展。
神的应许临到各世代、各民族。
